text: Glenn Florio (born January 26, 1967) is an American rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Glenn Florio
